title: Very nice and updated 1 bed 1 bath apartment available for rent
description:
Welcome to the Elm! Your premier apartment residences are located in the Overbrook section of Philadelphia. Conveniently located by St. Joes University, this building is home to 111 apartments, a mixture of studios to 1-2 beds, 4 commercial spaces, and 43 parking spaces. Be welcomed by three planted courtyards that provide The Elm residents with green spaces to connect them to the outdoors and nature. The main central courtyard plaza is welcoming, active, and used as a communal gathering area; it also serves as the main entrance to the apartment units. The building incorporates a green roof, porous pavers, and interior vegetated areas including beautiful trees that have been newly planted in the interior courtyards beside its existing foliage. Never worry about finding parking with access to a driveway that leads to a private and concealed lot behind and under the rear of the building. Look forward to 6129 sf of commercial space oriented towards 63rd street. Each commercial space has direct access to the street and they have access from the central courtyard plaza. Grab coffee right outside your door before heading to class or on your way to study. On the site, there is also a historically contributing building, which The Elm has been designed around. Residents will love the 2- story building that has plans to be renovated and used as a gym and meeting space for the residences. Enjoy all the neighborhood has to offer within minutes of your new home. Grab a cheesesteak at Bustos Tavern, Happy Hour at the Great American Pub, or catch the game at Brownies Sports Bar. Journey into Center City by hopping on Septa at Overbrook station or enjoy local parks like Wynnewood Valley, Carroll, and Morris Parks. Shop till you drop at City Avenue Shopping Center where TJ Max and Ross deals await.

description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 712 on the 7th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as April 19, 2023!

* Renovated kitchen and bathroom

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Lovesac, Outdoor Voices, Paper Source, Kitchen Kapers, Salty Paws, L'Occitane en Provence, CB2, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore, and Sue's Produce Market. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Marathon on the Square, Spice Finch, Alice Pizza, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Pick up scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Jeni's. Indulge in a churro sundae at El Merkury. Relax with a manicure at Coco Blue Spruce. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Check out the latest exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
